actions.committee: House Committee on Foreign Affairs (Subsequently: International Relations)
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs (Subsequently: International Relations).

official_title: Resolution calling for peace in Northern Ireland and the establishment of a united Ireland.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Expresses the concern of the House of Representatives over the situation in Northern Ireland. Calls for: (1) termination of internment; (2) respect for civil rights, and (3) social reforms. Urges withdrawal of British Troops and unification of Ireland.

titles.title: Resolution calling for peace in Northern Ireland and the establishment of a united Ireland.
